<AT6>
情報：なし
【Recollection Room Instructions】
Enemy characters from cleared stages are
displayed in the Recollection Room.
Move in front of each character
to see his/her events.
- The green crystal will display relevant notes
about viewing a certain lines of dialogue.
- Examine the orange crystal to change the
Recollection Room settings.

情報：なし
【Important Info】
When ejaculating in the recollection room,
you may recieve bad statuses or fetishes.
To avoid this, please change the relevant
settings from the orange crystal.
